resources.string:
We are a Delhi Technological University based team of ambitious students with a keen drive to innovate and help the community.

 We are in collaboration with Tamana - School of hope., one of the most premier NGOs of India who have been working for the cause of Autism since 3 decades. Their excellent mentorship and constant support always drived and motivated us in achieving the ultimate goal of not just doing a project but also being an aid to the society. Our divine presence Padma Bhushan Dr.Shayama Chauna and our guiding light Dr. Krishnaveni Achary helped us achieve some great results.


Although we've always been aware of Autism, the knowledge of Alexithymia - a specific personality construct of the Autism Spectrum Disorder, came to us just a few years ago. Fascinated by the idea of recognizing emotions through speech we wondered if we could use this technology to help people communicate.

 And that is where it all began. 

 We decided to use a new approach, a new method. The method of technology. With ASCEND we can not only help alexithymic people communicate better, we can also help them understand emotions and help them in reacting to situations they earlier found difficult to express themselves in.

 Kartik Bhutani
Java Slayer, Number Player and a Seasoned Voyager in the sea of difficulties.

 Suvigya Nijhawan
Codeigniter, Visual Interpreter and a Staunch Crusader in the battle of peculiarities.

 Sonam Tshering
Python Enthusiast, Team Worker and Conflict Resolver in the inevitable path to success.

 Viha Gupta
Graphics Artist, UI-Designer and Resolute Motivator in the spiraling vortex of obstacles.
